con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="Consumer TestSuite"/> <con:entry key="Report to Generate" value=""/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="soapui-setings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="forgotPassword TestCase"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://yukon.cannontech.com/service" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://yukon.cannontech.com/api" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://yukon.cannontech.com/service"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://yukon.cannontech.com/api" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:yukon="http://yukon.cannontech.com/api"> <xsd:simpleType name="AccountNumber"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SerialNumber"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="UnboundedLimit"> <xsd:union memberTypes="xsd:positiveInteger yukon:UnboundedLimitWord"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="UnboundedLimitWord"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="unbounded"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="emptyElement"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:anyType"/> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ThermostatMode"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Auto"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Cool"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Heat"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Off"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ThermostatFan"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Auto"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Circulate"/> <xsd:enumeration value="On"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TemperatureUnit"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="F|C"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="Temperature"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:double"> <xsd:attribute name="unit" type="yukon:TemperatureUnit"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="OptOutType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ENABLED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DISABLED_WITH_COMM"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DISABLED_WITHOUT_COMM"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="HardwareClass"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SWITCH"/> <xsd:enumeration value="THERMOSTAT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="METER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GATEWAY"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="nonNegativeInt"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A 32 bit non-negative integer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="NamedElement"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This type is used as a base class for any complex type that requires a name element.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="YukonMessage"> <xsd:attribute name="version" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="yukonUser"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="extra"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:any processContents="skip"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="Success"/> <xsd:complexType name="Failure"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="errorCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="errorReference" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="errorDescription" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SimpleSuccessOrFailure"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="success" type="yukon:Success"/> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Token"> <xsd:attribute name="value" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="TokenMessage"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This type is used as the parent for all Yukon Messages that contain a token element.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="token" type="yukon:Token"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CustomerAccount"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="accountNumber" type="yukon:AccountNumber"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="mainAddress" type="yukon:USAddress"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="billingAddress" type="yukon:USAddress"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="lastName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="firstName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="homePhone" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="workPhone" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="email" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="isCommercial" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="companyName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="siteInformation" type="yukon:SiteInformationData"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="alternateTrackingNumber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="mapNumber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="accountUser" type="yukon:YukonUser"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If the accountUser is left blank the ConsumerInfoRole.CREATE_LOGIN_FOR_ACCOUNT role property can be set to auto-create a login</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="voiceRecognition" type="yukon:VoiceRecognitionData"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="USAddress"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="street" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="street2" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="city" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="state" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="postalCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="county" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="YukonUser"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="username" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="password" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="loginGroupName" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SiteInformationData"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="substationName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="feeder" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="pole" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="transformerSize" type="xsd:positiveInteger"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="siteVoltage" type="xsd:positiveInteger"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="VoiceRecognitionData"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="username" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="pin" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CustomerAccountResult"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="accountNumber" type="yukon:AccountNumber"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="success"/> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="HardwareSummaryListRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="hardwareClass" type="yukon:HardwareClass"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="hardwareSummaryListRequest" type="yukon:HardwareSummaryListRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="HardwareSummaryListResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="hardwareSummaryList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="hardwareSummary" type="yukon:HardwareSummary"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="hardwareSummaryListResponse" type="yukon:HardwareSummaryListResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="HardwareSummary"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> <xsd:element name="deviceLabel" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="inventoryIdentifier" type="yukon:InventoryIdentifier"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="InventoryIdentifier"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="inventoryId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="hardwareType" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="UserLoginRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="username" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="password" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="userLoginRequest" type="yukon:UserLoginRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="UserLoginResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="sessionTimeoutLength" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="success"/> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="userLoginResponse" type="yukon:UserLoginResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="ForgotPasswordRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="username" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="email" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="firstName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="lastName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="accountNumber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="energyProvider" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="notes" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="forgotPasswordRequest" type="yukon:ForgotPasswordRequest"/> <xsd:element name="forgotPasswordResponse" type="yukon:SimpleSuccessOrFailure"/> <xsd:complexType name="ThermostatAndScheduleListRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"/> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="thermostatAndScheduleListRequest" type="yukon:ThermostatAndScheduleListRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="ThermostatAndScheduleListResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="thermostatAndScheduleList" type="yukon:ThermostatAndScheduleList"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ThermostatAndScheduleList"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="account" type="yukon:Account"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Schedule"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="scheduleId" type="yukon:nonNegativeInt"/> <xsd:element name="scheduleName" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Thermostat"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="inventoryId" type="yukon:nonNegativeInt"/> <xsd:element name="serialNumber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="deviceLabel" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="thermostatType" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="schedule" type="yukon:Schedule"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Account"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="accountNumber" type="yukon:AccountNumber"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="thermostat" type="yukon:Thermostat"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="thermostatAndScheduleListResponse" type="yukon:ThermostatAndScheduleListResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="RunThermostatProgramRequest"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This web service sends a command to the list of thermostats, which causes them to run their thermostat program.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="runThermostatProgramRequest" type="yukon:RunThermostatProgramRequest"/> <xsd:element name="runThermostatProgramResponse" type="yukon:SimpleSuccessOrFailure"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This web service sends a command to the list of thermostats, which causes them to to run their thermostat program.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="SendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This web service sends the default thermostat schedule to the thermostats supplied.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest" type="yukon:SendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="SendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the response returned from sending a default thermostat schedule. The sending of the default thermostat schedule is is done through the sendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="success"/> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse" type="yukon:SendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="SendManualThermostatSettingRequest"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This web service sends out a manual thermostat settings to a thermostat, which allows someone to change their current temperature, fan type, and mode of their thermostat..</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="manualThermostatSettingList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="manualThermostatSetting" type="yukon:ManualThermostatSetting"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sendManualThermostatSettingRequest" type="yukon:SendManualThermostatSettingRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="ManualThermostatSetting"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> <xsd:element name="mode" type="yukon:ThermostatMode"/> <xsd:element name="fanState" type="yukon:ThermostatFan"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="heatTemperature" type="yukon:Temperature"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="coolTemperature" type="yukon:Temperature"/> <xsd:element default="false" minOccurs="0" name="holdTemperature" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sendManualThermostatSettingResponse" type="yukon:SimpleSuccessOrFailure"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the response returned from sending a manually thermostat setting command. The sending of the manual thermostat setting command is is done through the sendManualThermostatSettingRequest.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="SendThermostatScheduleRequest"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This web service sends the supplied thermostat schedule to the thermostats supplied.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> <xsd:element name="scheduleName" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sendThermostatScheduleRequest" type="yukon:SendThermostatScheduleRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="SendThermostatScheduleResponse"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the response returned from sending a thermostat schedule. The sending of a thermostat schedule is is done through the sendThermostatScheduleRequest.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="success"/> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sendThermostatScheduleResponse" type="yukon:SendThermostatScheduleResponse"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest" name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendThermostatScheduleRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendThermostatScheduleRequest" name="sendThermostatScheduleRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="runThermostatProgramResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:runThermostatProgramResponse" name="runThermostatProgramResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendManualThermostatSettingResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendManualThermostatSettingResponse" name="sendManualThermostatSettingResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse" name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="userLoginRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:userLoginRequest" name="userLoginRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="forgotPasswordResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:forgotPasswordResponse" name="forgotPasswordResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="hardwareSummaryListRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:hardwareSummaryListRequest" name="hardwareSummaryListRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="userLoginResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:userLoginResponse" name="userLoginResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="runThermostatProgramRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:runThermostatProgramRequest" name="runThermostatProgramRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="thermostatAndScheduleListRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:thermostatAndScheduleListRequest" name="thermostatAndScheduleListRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendManualThermostatSettingRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendManualThermostatSettingRequest" name="sendManualThermostatSettingRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="hardwareSummaryListResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:hardwareSummaryListResponse" name="hardwareSummaryListResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="thermostatAndScheduleListResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:thermostatAndScheduleListResponse" name="thermostatAndScheduleListResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendThermostatScheduleResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendThermostatScheduleResponse" name="sendThermostatScheduleResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="extraHeader"> <wsdl:part element="sch:extra" name="extra"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="forgotPasswordRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:forgotPasswordRequest" name="forgotPasswordRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="yukonUserHeader"> <wsdl:part element="sch:yukonUser" name="yukonUser"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="consumerPort"> <wsdl:operation name="hardwareSummaryList"> <wsdl:input message="tns:hardwareSummaryListRequest" name="hardwareSummaryListRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:hardwareSummaryListResponse" name="hardwareSummaryListResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendThermostatSchedule"> <wsdl:input message="tns:sendThermostatScheduleRequest" name="sendThermostatScheduleRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:sendThermostatScheduleResponse" name="sendThermostatScheduleResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="runThermostatProgram"> <wsdl:input message="tns:runThermostatProgramRequest" name="runThermostatProgramRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:runThermostatProgramResponse" name="runThermostatProgramResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="thermostatAndScheduleList"> <wsdl:input message="tns:thermostatAndScheduleListRequest" name="thermostatAndScheduleListRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:thermostatAndScheduleListResponse" name="thermostatAndScheduleListResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendManualThermostatSetting"> <wsdl:input message="tns:sendManualThermostatSettingRequest" name="sendManualThermostatSettingRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:sendManualThermostatSettingResponse" name="sendManualThermostatSettingResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="forgotPassword"> <wsdl:input message="tns:forgotPasswordRequest" name="forgotPasswordRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:forgotPasswordResponse" name="forgotPasswordResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="userLogin"> <wsdl:input message="tns:userLoginRequest" name="userLoginRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:userLoginResponse" name="userLoginResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendDefaultThermostatSchedule"> <wsdl:input message="tns:sendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest" name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:sendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse" name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="consumerPortSoap11" type="tns:consumerPort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="hardwareSummaryList"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="hardwareSummaryListRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:extraHeader" part="extra" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:header message="tns:yukonUserHeader" part="yukonUser" use="literal"></soap:header> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="hardwareSummaryListResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:extraHeader" part="extra" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:header message="tns:yukonUserHeader" part="yukonUser" use="literal"></soap:header> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendThermostatSchedule"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="sendThermostatScheduleRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:extraHeader" part="extra" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:header message="tns:yukonUserHeader" part="yukonUser" use="literal"></soap:header> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="sendThermostatScheduleResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:extraHeader" part="extra" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:header message="tns:yukonUserHeader" part="yukonUser" use="literal"></soap:header> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="runThermostatProgram"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="runThermostatProgramRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:extraHeader" part="extra" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:header message="tns:yukonUserHeader" part="yukonUser" use="literal"></soap:header> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="runThermostatProgramResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:extraHeader" part="extra" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:header message="tns:yukonUserHeader" part="yukonUser" use="literal"></soap:header> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="thermostatAndScheduleList"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="thermostatAndScheduleListRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:extraHeader" part="extra" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:header message="tns:yukonUserHeader" part="yukonUser" use="literal"></soap:header> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="thermostatAndScheduleListResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:extraHeader" part="extra" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:header message="tns:yukonUserHeader" part="yukonUser" use="literal"></soap:header> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendManualThermostatSetting"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="sendManualThermostatSettingRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:extraHeader" part="extra" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:header message="tns:yukonUserHeader" part="yukonUser" use="literal"></soap:header> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output
